ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of the HONOURABLE H. WADE MACLAUCHLAN, C.M., O.P.E.I., to be a special adviser to the Prime Minister, to serve as a member of the Independent Advisory Board for Supreme Court of Canada Judicial Appointments, to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year; and his designation as the Chairperson of the Independent Advisory Board for Supreme Court of Canada Judicial Appointments.
